name: Ecommerce Web Application
description: The Ecommerce Web Application is a modern, high-performance online store designed to provide a seamless shopping experience. It features a sleek and responsive design, ensuring an optimal user experience on any device. Built using cutting-edge technologies, this application demonstrates robust functionality and a clean, intuitive interface.

name: Afroboost
description: Afroboost is a revolutionary application designed to showcase African artists and entrepreneurs. By registering on this platform, you'll be able to boost your visibility through a multitude of events, promotions and shows. Join us at festivals, concerts and fairs to benefit from an extensive network. Our support also extends to athletes, entrepreneurs, dance schools and cultural players. With Afroboost, projects become easier thanks to our Artboost association. Explore and promote your talent now!
